pages.text: $(#630000)The Vengeful and Wrathful cores are particularly useful in crafting, but I'd rather not have to kill any parasites. Luckily, I have created a solution: The Soulless Core.
$(#630000)Simply using this item on an Adapted or Pure tier parasite will create a Vengeful or Wrathful core, respectively, consuming the parasite and Soulless Core in the process.
